thread.section_title: DPD Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DPD Ireland | www.dpd.ie
thread.title: minimal

author: minimal
title: minimal
text:
Courier Jason ring me this afternoon to let me know he will be waiting downstairs in 2 min with my parcels. When I got down I discovered there is no driver, no Van and no parcels, tooo fast, didn't wait even a minute.
Just saw him spinning wheels down the road and he was gone, of course he did ignore my phone calls. Another great service from DPD.
He didn't respond to my phone calls
